tool.name: PanISa: IS search
tool.description: Search integrative element (IS) insertion on a genome using BAM alignment
tool.command: panISa.py #if str($quality) -q $quality #end if #if str($minimun) -m $minimun #end if #if str($size) -s $size #end if #if str($percentage) -p $percentage #end if '$bam' > '$output'

param.name: quality
param.label: Minimun alignment quality value to conserve a clipped

param.name: minimun
param.label: Minimun number of clipped reads to look at IS on a position

param.name: size
param.label: Maximun size of direct repeat region

param.name: percentage
param.label: Minimum percentage of same base to create consensus

tool.help:
**What it does**
Search integrative element (IS) insertion on a genome using BAM alignment.
